org.sakaiproject.sms.api
Interface SmsBilling

All Known Implementing Classes:
SmsBillingImpl
public interface SmsBilling

The billing service will handle all financial functions for the sms tool in Sakai.

Version:
1.0
Author:
louis@psybergate.com

allocateCredits

void allocateCredits(java.lang.Long accountID,
                     int creditCount)
Add extra credits to the specific account by making an entry into SMS_TRANSACTION . Also update the available credits on the account.

Parameters:
accountID - the account id
creditCount - the credit count

getAccountID

                            throws org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.logic.impl.exception.SmsAccountNotFoundException
Use Sakai siteID, Sakai userID and account type to get a valid account id. AccountType is only outgoing masses for now.

reserveCredits

boolean reserveCredits(org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsTask smsTask)
Insert a new transaction and indicate that the credits are reserved. If the request is pending and the administrator delete the request, the reservation must be rolled back with another transaction.

Parameters:
smsTask - the sms task
Returns:
true, if reserve credits
